name: Sack Lunch: Peanut Butter and Honey Sandwich
description: You don’t need me to tell you to pack a sandwich for lunch, but lately for some reason I can’t get peanut butter and honey out of my head. Though I’ve been eating it on spelt bread in a gesture...

recipeInstructions.text: If your bread is frozen, defrost it in a toaster or under the broiler for a minute or two. Spread with peanut butter and honey. Include a layer of banana if you like and close the sandwich up. Slice in half lengthwise or diagonally as nostalgia demands.
